85050.summary: Some customers in Bruderheim are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85050.title: Nov 30 - Bruderheim | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

85053.title: Nov 30 - Calgary (Bridlewood) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
